readyLabelText: Ready? Book now, pay after your visit!
covidCancel: If you need to cancel a booking due to quarantine or any other Covid-related reason, we are waiving all cancellation fees.
visitDurationLabel: How long should we visit (at $35 per hour)?
visitDayLabel: Which day would you like your first and ongoing visits to occur?
initialVisitLabel: Please note that this will be the visit time for your initial visit - following this we'll visit between 8am - 5pm (and will send you a reminder the day before to confirm the exact time). Let us know below if this does not work.
butlerPreferenceLabel: Do you prefer a male or female butler?
